title: #521 - Nick Turturro
description:
Nick Turturro, Actor seen in films and TV such as "The Longest Yard" and "NYPD Blue," joins Joey Diaz and Lee Syatt live in studio.

This podcast is brought to you by:
 
Five Four Club - Go To Fivefourclub.com and use Promo code JOEY for 50% of your first month's package plus a free pair of sunglasses.
 
Onnit.com. Use Promo code CHURCH for a 10% discount at checkout.
   
Recorded live on 10/02/2017.
